title: Mac Saver Builder (com.apple.screensaver)
description: Configuration schema for macOS screen saver settings.

askForPassword.title: Require Password
askForPassword.description: Determines if a password is required to unlock the screen saver.

askForPasswordDelay.title: Password Delay
askForPasswordDelay.description: Time in seconds before requiring a password after the screen saver starts.

idleTime.title: Idle Time
idleTime.description: Time in seconds before the screen saver starts when the system is idle.

loginWindowIdleTime.title: Login Window Idle Time
loginWindowIdleTime.description: Time in seconds before the screen saver starts at the login window.

loginWindowModulePath.title: Screen Saver Path for Login Window
loginWindowModulePath.description: The path to the screen saver used at the login window.

moduleName.title: Screen Saver Name
moduleName.description: The name of the screen saver to use.
